communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Massachusetts Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

A list (in Excel or CSV format) of all police officers who were employed by the Boston Police Department (BPD) in 1995 and 2000. Please include badge number, first name, last name, start date, and end/retirement date (if applicable).

I also request that, if appropriate, fees be waived as we believe this request is in the public interest, as suggested but not stipulated by the recommendations of the Massachusetts Supervisor of Public Records. The requested documents will be made available to the general public free of charge as part of the public information service at MuckRock.com, and is not made for commercial usage.

I expect the request to be filled in an accessible format, including for screen readers, which provide text-to-speech for persons unable to read print. Files that are not accessible to screen readers include, for example, .pdf image files as well as physical documents.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Gerard Domenech

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Indiana Access to Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to video footage from a police intervention, specifically from the body camera worn by the officer(s) and the dashcam of the police vehicles involved. Article:
https://www.wbiw.com/2024/03/21/woman-arrested-after-stealing-items-from-walmart-and-fleeing-from-police/

Exact date of incident: March 19, 2024
Names of parties involved: Sarah Dent

I intend to use this footage solely for educational purposes to promote a better understanding of law enforcement procedures and the application of the law.

I understand that there may be associated costs for providing this footage, and I am more than willing to cover any fees incurred. Please inform me about the necessary procedures and the costs involved.

Thank you in advance for your assistance. I trust that this footage will be invaluable for my educational efforts, and I greatly appreciate your cooperation.


Best regards,
George Smith

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

George Smith

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the North Dakota Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

All investigative reports, memos, case files, letters or other records in the possession of the North Dakota Department of Agriculture concerning the Arthur Companies' 2017 spill of rinsate, which contaminated the farm field of Donald Garnas in or around Page, North Dakota. This request includes any records in the possession of pesticide enforcer Tyler Kralicek. For more information on the case in question, please see this news story: https://www.feedandgrain.com/safety/news/15398184/north-dakota-ag-finds-rinsate-violation-at-grain-elevator

This request seeks records produced since June 1, 2017 and the date this request is processed. I am a reporter for Public Domain and other national news outlets and seek a fee waiver.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Jimmy Tobias

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to video footage from a police intervention, specifically from the body camera worn by the officer(s) the dashcam of the police vehicles involved and all of the video files. Article:
https://www.10news.com/news/local-news/woman-accused-of-shoplifting-at-irvine-mall-arrested-after-hiding-in-tesla-trunk

Exact date of incident: Aug. 14, 2024
Names of parties involved: Emely Yanagida

I intend to use this footage solely for educational purposes to promote a better understanding of law enforcement procedures and the application of the law.

I understand that there may be associated costs for providing this footage, and I am more than willing to cover any fees incurred. Please inform me about the necessary procedures and the costs involved.

Thank you in advance for your assistance. I trust that this footage will be invaluable for my educational efforts, and I greatly appreciate your cooperation.


Best regards,
George Smith

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

George Smith

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Ghislaine Maxwell BOP clearance data
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All SENTRY-generated clearance data for inmate Ghislaine Maxwell (register number 02879-509) from January 1, 2025 to Aug. 5, 2025.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

CJ Ciaramella

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Arrest of Shampayne Andrika Martin
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Copies of any and all body-worn camera footage and related audio/video recordings connected to the arrest of Shampayne Andrika Martin (DOB: 01/12/1991), Booking Number 2025-11425, conducted by the Hillsborough County Sheriff’s Office.

Specifically, I seek footage related to the charges of:
- Unlawfully Impede, Threaten, or Harass a First Responder (MISC1415)
- Resisting Officer Without Violence (COPS1001)

Court Case Number: 25-CM-003404-A

I am willing to accept redacted versions of the footage to comply with applicable privacy laws. Please advise me in advance of any costs associated with the processing of this request.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Jordi

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Arrest of Alicia Page Duke
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Copies of any and all body-worn camera footage, in-car video, and related audio recordings associated with the arrest of Alicia Page Duke (DOB: 05/26/1987), Booking Number 2025-10804, conducted by the Tampa Police Department.

Specifically, I seek footage related to the charges of:
- Petit Theft ($100 or less)
- Resisting Officer Without Violence (COPS1001)

Court Case Number: 25-CM-003213-A

I am willing to accept redacted versions of the footage to comply with applicable privacy laws. Please advise me in advance of any costs associated with the processing of this request.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Jordi
